6.Cons: Screaming, yelling, and lots of violence in the work environment. The manager picked favorites and made is very obvious he didn't like anyone except them. Guilt tripped me for not being able to work over time despite being 16 and not legally allowed to. I didn't even put in my 2 weeks notice because it was so toxic. I would never recommend anyone who has anxiety or yelling sensitivities to work for them. Also the floors were covered in food and wet, which is a slipping hazard. Absolutely disgusting kitchen area.
